name: Vignette
author: Tim Severien

sections.description:
A vignette is an effect used in photography. It basically darkens the edges of a photo and is sometimes undesired but in a lot of cases it’s being “added” by using a filter or afterwards using software.

Features

  • Multiple sizes and opacity’s of vignettes
  • Easy configurable
  • Does not interfere with other page elements such as buttons
  • Should work with all plugins

Enjoy your vignette!
sections.installation:
1. Install the directory in the wp-content/plugins folder
  2. Activate the plugin
  3. Change the settings (if needed)

You’re all done!

short_description: This plugin adds a vignette to your website.
